text: Ahmed Faraj Hussein Al Masli () (born March 4, 1979) is a Libyan international footballer. He currently plays for the Tunisian Ligue Professionnelle 1 club Club Athlétique Bizertin, as a striker. He is also a member of the Libyan national team. ==Career== By scoring against Al Hilal on November 21, 2008, al-Masli has now scored against every team in the Libyan Premier League. He is the only player ever to do so. After an impressive couple of seasons with Ahly Benghazi (2008–10), it was announced that the Egyptian Premier League side El- Entag El-Harby had signed the striker on a two-year deal. On December 27, 2011, the Tunisian Ligue Professionnelle 1 side Club Athlétique Bizertin had signed the striker on a one year and al half deal. ==External links== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Libyan footballers Category:Libya international footballers Category:2006 Africa Cup of Nations players Category:Association football forwards Category:Expatriate footballers in Kuwait Category:Al-Ittihad Club (Tripoli) players
title: Ahmed Al Masli
